mapper.select: select count(1) from t_qz_customer_keyword where fMark = 0 limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into t_qz_customer_keyword(fUuid, fCurrentPosition, fCapturePositionQueryTime, fOptimizePlanCount, fOptimizedCount ) SELECT fUuid, fCurrentPosition, fCapturePositionQueryTime, fOptimizePlanCount, fOptimizedCount FROM t_customer_keyword WHERE fQZSettingUuid = #{qsId} AND fStatus = 1

insert into t_qz_customer_keyword(fUuid, fOperaStatus ) SELECT fUuid, IF(fCurrentPosition = 0 and fFailedCause > '' and fOptimizedCount = 0 and fInvalidRefreshCount >= 2 and fLastOptimizeDateTime > current_date(), 0, 1) FROM t_customer_keyword WHERE fQZSettingUuid = #{qsId} AND fStatus = 1
insert into t_qz_customer_keyword(fUuid, fKeyword, fUrl ) SELECT KEYWORD_ID, KEYWORD, URL FROM sys_customer_keyword WHERE QS_ID = #{qsId} AND STATUS = 4
mapper.update: update t_qz_customer_keyword set fMark = #{mark} where fMark = #{targetMark} limit #{rows}
UPDATE sys_customer_keyword k, t_qz_customer_keyword tqck SET k.OPERA_STATUS = tqck.fOperaStatus WHERE k.QS_ID = #{qsId} and k.KEYWORD_ID = tqck.fUuid and tqck.fMark = 2

UPDATE t_customer_keyword ck, t_qz_customer_keyword tqck SET ck.fKeyword = tqck.fKeyword, ck.fUrl = tqck.fUrl, ck.fStatus = 1 WHERE ck.fUuid = tqck.fUuid and ck.fQZSettingUuid = #{qsId} and tqck.fMark = 2
